hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
GIT_BRANCH_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_BRANCH} | cut -d "/" -f 2` GIT_COMMIT_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_COMMIT} | cut -c1-7` cd "${WORKSPACE}"/docker/pic-sure-hpds-etl docker build -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} .
mkdir -p "${WORKSPACE}"/docker_image_output cd "${WORKSPACE}"/docker_image_output docker save hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} | gzip > pic-sure-hpds-etl.tar.gz
HPDS_ETL_IMAGE=`docker load < ./pic-sure-hpds-etl.tar.gz | cut -d ' ' -f 3`
echo ${HPDS_ETL_IMAGE}
cd "${WORKSPACE}"
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 1800 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
cd "${WORKSPACE}"/docker/pic-sure-hpds-etl/
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 1800 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
cd hpds/
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
